...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST
SUNDAY...

HAZARDOUS WEATHER...

 * SOME LIGHT SNOW OR FREEZING DRIZZLE WILL BE POSSIBLE INTO THE
   EARLY OVERNIGHT HOURS. LITTLE TO NO ACCUMULATIONS OF SNOW
   AND/OR ICE IS EXPECTED THROUGH 3 AM.

 * ALL PRECIPITATION WILL CHANGE TO SNOW AFTER 3 AM TONIGHT. SNOW
   ACCUMULATION OVERNIGHT SHOULD GENERALLY BE AN INCH OR LESS.

 * SNOW WILL CONTINUE DURING THE DAY ON SUNDAY. AN ADDITIONAL 1 TO
   3 INCHES OF SNOW ACCUMULATION IS EXPECTED ON SUNDAY. 

IMPACTS...

 * ROADS WILL REMAIN SLICK THROUGH TONIGHT AND DURING THE DAY ON
   SUNDAY. 

 * VISIBILITIES WILL BE REDUCED TO BELOW A MILE AT TIMES LATE
   TONIGHT AND DURING THE DAY ON SUNDAY.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

 * THE MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION REMINDS MOTORISTS 
   TO ADJUST SPEEDS BASED ON THE CONDITIONS... AND TO TAKE IT 
   SLOW IN ICE AND SNOW. 

 * WEATHER PREPAREDNESS INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE ON LINE AT 
   WWW.READY.GOV/WINTER AND HTTP://GO.USA.GOV/5OG.
